name: ggicci::Json
short_description: A cute C++ library for easily parsing and manipulating JSON data structure.Convert a json structural string to a C++ object. And you can do things you want on this C++ object. You might just want to extract the data you want a json string represents. Or you might also want to modify the data in this json string. With this library, you can do all of these things on a C++ object parsed from your json string through simple statements. It's convienent.
summary: A cute C++ library for easily parsing and manipulating JSON data.
